segments.text: I hope the food here is good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is very expensive . Maybe we shouldn't have come here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the guidebook says a lot of the stars come here.If we are spending three days in Hollywood , I want to see at least one star .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we might not see any .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you like the tour of Universal Studios ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought it was O . K . But it really was too hot.And I think they should show people more . The exhibits should be more interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought it was great . Didn't you like the special effects rooms ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I still think it could be better .
segments.speaker: S2
